entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023
